headline: Why Palantir Stock Is Plummeting Today
summary: Shares of Palantir (NASDAQ: PLTR) fell on Friday.  The drop comes as the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq Composite both fell by more than 5%.  The artificial intelligence (AI) software provider's stock is facing pressure from escalations in the ongoing trade war.
